title: Mercedes to recall 4,419 vehicles in Russia: watchdog
text: March 26, 2018 / 12:59 PM / Updated 15 minutes ago Mercedes to recall 4,419 vehicles in Russia: watchdog Reuters Staff 1 Min Read MOSCOW (Reuters) - Automaker Mercedes-Benz ( DAIGn.DE ) will recall 4,419 of its C-class and GLC-class vehicles in Russia due to a possible fault with the driver’s airbag, Russia’s standards agency said on Monday. The logo of Mercedes-Benz is pictured on a car during the 88th Geneva International Motor Show in Geneva, Switzerland, March 7, 2018. REUTERS/Denis Balibouse Reporting by Gleb Stolyarov; Writing by Christian Lowe; Editing by Gabrielle Tetrault-Farber
